author: Staff Reporter
text:
Venkatesh (32), a labourer, was hacked to death allegedly during a drunken brawl here in Rayakottai on Wednesday.

Injuries

According to police, the victim had left home on his moped late Tuesday evening and never returned. The man’s body was found with multiple injuries in the foothills near his house on Wednesday morning. Liquor bottles and plastic cups were found near the body. Police suspect that the crime could have happened during a drunken brawl. Investigations are on.
title: Man found dead
